<title level="1" pfs="">[Burning Mammoth Hunters](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1761)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Burning Mammoth Hunters](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1761)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #175: Broken Tusk Moon](/Sources.aspx?ID=112) pg. 17</row>

**Perception** +7

**Languages**
[Hallit](/Languages.aspx?ID=37)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +5, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -1

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +0
</row>

**Items**
[Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [Rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=44), [Sling](/Weapons.aspx?ID=72) (20 bullets), [spears](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10) (3), [tindertwigs](/Equipment.aspx?ID=138) (3)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +4 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +7 

</row>

**HP** 15

**Spurred by Death** <actions string="Reaction" /> **Trigger** An ally within 30 feet reduces a creature to 0 HP; **Effect** The hunter Steps or Strides.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spear +8,
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sling +7 ([Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 50 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+1 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spear +7 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Muscle Slicer**   A target critically hit by a hunter's Strike is flat-footed until the end of its next turn.

</column>
name: Burning Mammoth Hunters
